name: Vortex Grenade
description: A grenade that creates a Vortex which continually damages enemies trapped inside.

name: Glide
description: Jump and then press again while in the air to activate Glide.

name: Nova Bomb
description: Hurl an explosive bolt of Void Light at the enemy, disintegrating those caught within its blast.

name: Energy Drain
description: A powerful melee attack which drains energy from enemies and uses it to reduce the cooldown of your grenade.

name: Arcane Wisdom
description: Training focused on battle recovery and speed.

name: Annihilate
description: Increases the size of explosions created by Nova Bomb and grenades.

name: Ancestral Order
description: Training focused on all attributes.

name: Vortex Mastery
description: Increases the range of Axion Bolt seekers and the duration of the Vortex effect of Nova Bomb and Vortex Grenade.

name: Scatter Grenade
description: A grenade that splits into many submunitions and covers a large area with explosions.

name: Focused Control
description: Upgrades Glide for better directional control while in the air.

name: Vortex
description: Nova Bomb creates a Vortex which continually damages enemies trapped inside.

name: Surge
description: Damaging an enemy with Energy Drain increases weapon and movement speed.

name: Arcane Spirit
description: Training focused on battle recovery and toughness.

name: Angry Magic
description: Nova Bomb tracks enemies.

name: Chaos Order
description: Training focused on raw speed.

name: Bloom
description: Enemies killed by any of your abilities explode.

name: Axion Bolt
description: A bolt of Void Light which forks into smaller bolts on impact which seek toward enemies.

name: Focused Burst
description: Upgrades Glide to provide an initial boost of speed.

name: Shatter
description: Nova Bomb splits into three projectiles.

name: Life Steal
description: Killing an enemy with Energy Drain immediately restores a significant portion of your health.

name: Arcane Force
description: Training focused on toughness and speed.

name: The Hunger
description: Increases the duration of the Energy Drain effect.

name: Divine Order
description: Training focused on toughness at all costs.

name: Embrace the Void
description: Damaging enemies with Nova Bomb or any grenade triggers the Energy Drain effect.

name: Blink
description: A short distance teleport which replaces Glide.

name: Lance
description: Nova Bomb travels farther and faster.

name: Soul Rip
description: Killing an enemy with Energy Drain reduces the cooldown of Nova Bomb.
